question: Which of the following reaction/s does not yield an amine?
I. <katex>$\text{R-X} + \text{NH}_3 \xrightarrow{\Delta}$</katex>
II. <katex>$\text{R-CN} \xrightarrow{\text{H}_2/\text{Ni}}$</katex>
III. <katex>$\text{R-C}\equiv\text{N} + \text{H}_2\text{O} \xrightarrow{\text{H}^+}$</katex>
IV. <katex>$\text{R-CONH}_2 \xrightarrow{\text{LiAlH}_4}$</katex>
explanation: Reaction III is the hydrolysis of a nitrile (cyanide), which yields a Carboxylic acid, not an amine.
